title.value: Характеристика партенокарпических гибридов огурца белорусской селекции для пленочных теплиц
Traits of Belarusian parthenocarpic cucumber hybrids breeding for film greenhouses

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shajturo, I.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on studying the range of commercially valuable traits (yield, parthenocarpy, size and leaf color, shape, size, color and surface of the fruit, the color of thorns, diseased) of parthenocarpic cucumber hybrids for film greenhouses - Plyn F1, Tonus Fland Braginka F1. Biochemical parameters (dry matter, sugars, ascorbic acid) of young fruit are determinated. Yield of hybrids was 15,2-16,7 kg/m2. Studied hybrids less diseased are than the standard (peronosporosis, olive spot, and powdery mildew). The mentioned above hybrids are suitable for use in fresh and are recommended for vinegar pickling. Hybrids Plyn F1, Tonus F1 and Braginka F1 in comparison with the standard Forum F1 to a lesser extent were affected by diseases - olive blotch, powdery mildew and downy mildew. The economic effect of the cultivation of cucumber hybrids created in greenhouses is 19,9-29,9 thousand USD / ha.
